item.title: About
item.description:
I am Final Year undergraduate pursuing B-Tech in Computer Science at NITK Surathkal.

I am budding Computer Engineer. I love tinkering with code. I enjoy solving problems at Codechef and other Competitive coding sites. I also like playing Table Tennis.

My dream is to build something that is not only innovative but also serves the society.
